Package display

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FocusComponent  
    FooterComponent  
    HeaderComponent  
    SidebarComponent  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Display
    The whole of the GUI of Asphodel Sky.
    GUIFocus
    The main focus of the Asphodel Sky GUI, this is where the grid is based.
    GUIFooter
    The bottom-most portion of the Asphodel Sky GUI, this typically contains descriptions or some sort of text feed, depending on the mode of the component.
    GUIHeader
    The uppermost component to the Asphodel Sky GUI; This typically contains information that needs to be readily-known, such as a name, time, and floor.
    GUISidebar
    A component of the Asphodel Sky GUI containing player information.
